001package ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.SegmentPersistencePort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
005import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
006import java.time.Duration;
007import java.util.Base64;
008import java.util.Objects;
009import java.util.Properties;
010import org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.KafkaProducer;
011import org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.Producer;
012import org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.ProducerConfig;
013import org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.ProducerRecord;
014import org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ByteArraySerializer;
015import org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringSerializer;
016
017/**
018 * Kafka-backed {@link SegmentPersistencePort} that streams serialized TCP segments to a topic.
019 * <p>Acts as an infrastructure adapter for the assemble pipeline. Thread-safety follows the
020 * supplied {@link Producer} implementation (the default {@link KafkaProducer} is thread-safe).
021 *
022 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023 */
024public final class SegmentKafkaSinkAdapter implements SegmentPersistencePort {
025  private final Producer<String, byte[]> producer;
026  private final String topic;
027
028  /**
029   * Creates a Kafka sink for segment records.
030   *
031   * @param bootstrapServers comma-separated Kafka bootstrap servers
032   * @param topic topic that receives serialized segments
033   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code bootstrapServers} is {@code null}
034   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code bootstrapServers} is blank or {@code topic} is {@code null} or blank
035   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
036   */
037  public SegmentKafkaSinkAdapter(String bootstrapServers, String topic) {
038    this(createProducer(bootstrapServers), sanitizeTopic(topic));
039  }
040
041  SegmentKafkaSinkAdapter(Producer<String, byte[]> producer, String topic) {
042    this.producer = Objects.requireNonNull(producer, "producer");
043    this.topic = sanitizeTopic(topic);
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Publishes the segment to Kafka.
048   *
049   * @param record segment record to persist; {@code null} inputs are ignored
050   * @implNote Uses a flow-based key to preserve per-connection ordering.
051   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
052   */
053  @Override
054  public void persist(SegmentRecord record) {
055    if (record == null) {
056      return;
057    }
058    ProducerRecord<String, byte[]> message =
059        new ProducerRecord<>(topic, flowKey(record), serialize(record));
060    producer.send(message);
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Flushes outstanding Kafka sends.
065   *
066   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
067   */
068  @Override
069  public void flush() {
070    producer.flush();
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Flushes pending messages and closes the producer.
075   *
076   * @implNote Waits up to five seconds for in-flight sends to complete.
077   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
078   */
079  @Override
080  public void close() {
081    producer.flush();
082    producer.close(Duration.ofSeconds(5));
083  }
084
085  private static String flowKey(SegmentRecord record) {
086    return new StringBuilder(64)
087        .append(record.srcIp()).append(':').append(record.srcPort())
088        .append('>').append(record.dstIp()).append(':').append(record.dstPort())
089        .toString();
090  }
091
092  private static byte[] serialize(SegmentRecord record) {
093    String payloadB64 = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(record.payload());
094    String json =
095        new StringBuilder(256)
096            .append('{')
097            .append("\"ts\":").append(record.timestampMicros())
098            .append(",\"src\":\"").append(escape(record.srcIp())).append('\"')
099            .append(",\"sport\":").append(record.srcPort())
100            .append(",\"dst\":\"").append(escape(record.dstIp())).append('\"')
101            .append(",\"dport\":").append(record.dstPort())
102            .append(",\"seq\":").append(record.sequence())
103            .append(",\"flags\":").append(record.flags())
104            .append(",\"payload\":\"").append(payloadB64).append('\"')
105            .append('}')
106            .toString();
107    return json.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
108  }
109
110  private static String escape(String value) {
111    if (value == null) {
112      return "";
113    }
114    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(value.length());
115    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
116      char c = value.charAt(i);
117      if (c == '"' || c == '\\') {
118        sb.append('\\');
119      }
120      sb.append(c);
121    }
122    return sb.toString();
123  }
124
125  private static String sanitizeTopic(String topic) {
126    if (topic == null) {
127      throw new IllegalArgumentException("topic must not be null");
128    }
129    String trimmed = topic.trim();
130    if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {
131      throw new IllegalArgumentException("topic must not be blank");
132    }
133    return trimmed;
134  }
135
136  private static Producer<String, byte[]> createProducer(String bootstrapServers) {
137    Objects.requireNonNull(bootstrapServers, "bootstrapServers");
138    String trimmed = bootstrapServers.trim();
139    if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {
140      throw new IllegalArgumentException("bootstrapServers must not be blank");
141    }
142    Properties props = new Properties();
143    props.put(ProducerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG, trimmed);
144    props.put(ProducerConfig.ACKS_CONFIG, "all");
145    props.put(ProducerConfig.LINGER_MS_CONFIG, 5);
146    props.put(ProducerConfig.KEY_SERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringSerializer.class.getName());
147    props.put(ProducerConfig.VALUE_SERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, ByteArraySerializer.class.getName());
148    return new KafkaProducer<>(props);
149  }
150}
151
